input: Which one of the following is incorrect in respect of local government in India?

options.A: According to the Indian constitution, local government is not an independent tier in the federal system.
options.B: 30% of the seats in local bodies are reserved for women.
options.C: Local government finances are to be provided by a commission.
options.D: Elections to local bodies are to be determined by a commission.

explanation: Under Article 243, it has been mentioned that not less than 1/3rd (33%) seats in the local bodies shall be reserved for women.
